favourite.article: My gospel life. Best gospel song ever :)

It's not by coincidence.
THE LORD, journeyed the longest journey just to reach us. He as God became a man, left His glory to be a lowly man, to bind our wounds and to pour oil and wine upon it and then He brings us to the “inn” to be taken care of. (Luke 10:33)
How I treasure this wonderful Person, who is now living inside of me. Thank you Lord, for saving me from vanity. Now I am enjoying You as my eternal portion. God-man Saviour! I do praise You.

i was in my low spirit and i really need God's answer. When i was browsing hymnal thru this site and found this song. It touches me and reminded me to wait for God's answer. He will never leave me nor ignore me. He is not far from me yet He is inside my heart. God I love You. Amen.
this song brought me out of a difficult time, we all search for an awnser, the lord is our only answer.

Through this song I felt that Lord has given me the power on how to preach the gospel to my friends. Only this song can let them find their real real answer.... I hope God can move them to Him as soon as possible.
